col.description: The number of columns in the grid

border.description: Whether to display the border of the grid

align.description: The alignment of the grids, which is used to control the alignment scene when there are only one or two grids
align.description_zh: 宫格的对齐方式，用于控制只有一两个宫格时的对齐场景

hover-class.description: The style class name is valid when pressed, the style must be written in the App.vue of the root directory or the global style introduced through it to be valid, and the none is ineffective and acts on the header area
hover-class.description_zh: 样式类名，按下时有效，样式必须写在根目录的App.vue或通过其引入的全局样式中才有效，none为无效果，作用于头部标题区域

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a grid is clicked
